question: 雑費
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Random</kanji> <kanji>expense</kanji>s are <vocabulary>miscellaneous expenses</vocabulary>. Not actually random, but they feel that way.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. The <ja>ざつ</ja> goes to <ja>ざっ</ja> and the <ja>ひ</ja> goes to <ja>ぴ</ja>, making it into a dumb sounding word, like "zappy" (<ja>ざっぴ</ja>), so you can think about how some of your miscellaneous expenses were on zappy items.
